This Bruno film took 1 h to download. But the speed has its price. ItÂ´s filmed inside the theatre. The sound is muffled as the camera had only one inbuilt microphone. Pretty bad sound actially.. You hear the audience laughing and the cameraman is sometimes lauging too and shaking the camera. You also here him pressing buttons on the camera as to ajust whitebalance.  The quality of the film is the same as if you film you own television. You see the edges, the screen sparks and you see somtimes vertival lines.
